title: College Admissions, Employers, and Social Media

content.question: Write an essay that synthesizes material from at least three of the sources and develops a position on whether checking social networking profiles is an acceptable practice for potential employers or college admissions officers.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that synthesizes material from at least three of the sources and develops a position on whether checking social networking profiles is an acceptable practice for potential employers or college admissions officers.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Write introductions and conclusions appropriate to the purpose and context of the rhetorical situation.
